institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 38 (Performance Evaluation)
contents: Article 38 (Performance Evaluation) ① The Chairman of the Board may conduct a performance evaluation of each center based on the business performance of the current year. ② The Chairman of the Board may form an evaluation committee of about 5 external experts and comprehensively conduct qualitative evaluation and quantitative performance. After the evaluation, follow-up measures can be taken, such as granting incentives to excellent organizations and reducing support to underperforming organizations. ③ Matters such as the composition of the evaluation committee, detailed evaluation indicators, and incentives are separately determined by the chairman.
